product.name: Heart Beats
product.description: The Organic collection inspiration comes from being far from home. I miss a lot of places but the place I miss the most is holy Mecca where the Ka'aba is. In tribute, I created a shape that relates to the black stone silver holder in the corner of the Ka'aba.
product.insperation: Black Stone Silver holder at ALkaa'bah’s corner

product.name: Roué
product.description: 1950-2016 the design world is still reeling from the shock of Zaha Hadid’s unexpected death this year. Zaha Hadid’s death influenced me to appreciate her work by designing the the Runway collection .
